mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zhichuxinxi_mingmu_name as zhichuxinxiMingmuName ,a.zhichuxinxi_types as zhichuxinxiTypes ,a.zhichuxinxi_money as zhichuxinxiMoney ,a.zhichu_content as zhichuContent ,a.zhichuxinxi_time as zhichuxinxiTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM zhichuxinxi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.zhichuxinxi_mingmu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhichuxinxiMingmuName},'%')
and a.zhichuxinxi_types = #{params.zhichuxinxiTypes}
and a.zhichuxinxi_money >= #{params.zhichuxinxiMoneyStart}
and a.zhichuxinxi_money <= #{params.zhichuxinxiMoneyEnd}
and a.zhichu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhichuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.zhichuxinxi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.zhichuxinxiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.zhichuxinxi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.zhichuxinxiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
